features: Portable Washing Machine: The mini portable washing machine is a simple alternative to laundry. It can replace sending dirty clothes to expensive laundry every weekend. It takes up very little space in your room. It is an independent washing machine chassis. Hang directly on the wall of the barrel, or put it on the bottom of the barrel.

High Efficiency: Ultrasound turbo washer is ultrasonic and turbo . The hydraulic turbine works for 5 minutes, and the automatic ultrasonic vibration for 1 minute, intelligent interaction, can prevent entanglement, and is safe and silent.

Widely Application: This is a mini portable laundry washer. It has many advantages because it is not only portable and light, but also saves space. This makes it ideal for small houses, dormitories, RVs, and travel or mobile homes.
USB Charging: This washing machine can carry 1kg of clothes, suitable for travel and children's laundry. This mini portable washing machine is charged via USB and the power supply is 6w.
Applicability: Weight 320g, can carry 1KG laundry weight, suitable for travel and children's laundry, can be carried in a pocket or handbag.
body.description: Features: Ultrasound and turbine . Hydraulic turbine works for 5 minutes, automatic ultrasonic vibration for 1 minute, intelligent interaction. Automatically positive and negative. When the turbine rotates for 15 seconds, it automatically reverses for 15 seconds. Punctual shutdown protection for 30 minutes. (Restart requires reconnecting the USB plug) For USB power supply, the power supply is 6W, the turbine is automatically cleaned for 15 seconds, the turbine works for 5 minutes, and the automatic ultrasonic vibration is one minute, which can bear the weight of 1KG laundry. It is most suitable for travel agencies and children's laundries. Prevent winding, easy to carry. Specification: Condition: Brand New Material: ABS Input voltage: DC10V Power supply mode: USB Size: 13cm in diameter Thickness: 5.3cm Rated voltage: DC 10V Forward and reverse loading:200 rpm/min Positive rotation time: 15 seconds reverse installation time: 15 seconds Turbine working hours: 5 minutes switching Ultrasound working time: 60 seconds switching Optional Color: Green, White Package Weight: Approx 320g Package List: 1 * Host 1 * User Manual 1 * sucker (sucker color and shape random) Notes: 1. Please allow 1-3cm error due to manual measurement. Thanks for your understanding. 2. Monitors are not calibrated same, item color displayed in photos may be showing slightly different from the real object. Please take the real one as standard.

reviews.reviewText: I spent more money on this one than I did my last one so I figured it would work a little better. Unfortunately, this one didn't work as well then only worked once.
